name: Treadmill
about: How long should a beginner run on a treadmill Start by running for 20 minutes at a time, three times per week.

name: Stationary bicycle
about: Start with a 25- to 35-minute workout and progress from there, adding time in 1-minute increments as you build up your fitness.

name: Dumbbell
about: More suggests keeping it simple and choosing light dumbbellsâ€”ideally between five and 10 pounds.

name: Smith machine
about: The typical starting weight of a barbell on a Smith Machine can be expected to weight about 15-30 lbs.

name: Leg curl
about: For a seated leg extension with ankle weights, start with 5-pound weights and progress only to 10-pound weights.

name: Pull-down
about: Start by programming three to five sets of 10-15 repetitions with moderate to heavy loads OR two to four sets of 15-25 repetitions

name: Rowing machine
about: Row for a minimum of 5 minutes and a maximum of 20 minutes when starting out. Keep a log of what you do each week

name: Barbells
about: start with a weight that you can lift 10 to 15 times with proper form. Begin with 1 or 2 sets of 10 to 15 repetitions, and slowly progress to 3 sets

name: Abdominal roller
about: Depending on your strength, you should aim to complete anywhere from 6-12 reps for 3-4 sets of the ab wheel rollout.
